Coding: 1 - recommend closing (or recommend work from home)
2 - require closing (or work from home) for some sectors or categories of workers.
3 - require closing (or work from home) for all-but-essential workplaces (eg grocery stores, doctors)

Name: C6_Stay at home rerquirements
Description: Record orders to "shelter-in-place" and otherwise confine to the home

Coding: 2 - require not leaving house with exceptions for daily exercise, grocery shopping, and 'essential trips'
3 - require not leaving house with minimal exceptions (eg allowed to leave house once a week, or only one person can leave aat a time, etc)
